com.smartgov.lez.core.environment.lez

Class Lez

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.smartgov.lez.core.environment.lez.Lez

  • public class Lez
extends java.lang.Object
    A Low Emission Zone representation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Lez(smartgov.urban.geo.utils.LatLon[] perimeter, LezCriteria lezCriteria)
      Lez constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean contains(smartgov.urban.osm.environment.graph.OsmNode node)
      Determines if the specified osm node is contained in the lez, thanks to a JTS Point-In-Polygon algorithm.
      smartgov.core.environment.graph.astar.Costs costs(DeliveryVehicle deliveryVehicle)
      Returns the cost function associated to this vehicle, depending on its permission to enter the LEZ or not.
      LezCriteria getLezCriteria()
      Return the LEZ criteria associated to this LEZ, that determines which vehicles are allowed or not.
      smartgov.urban.geo.utils.LatLon[] getPerimeter() 
      static Lez none()
      Returns a special LEZ instance with no perimeter and all vehicles allowed, that can be smartly used by scenarios with a lez parameter to compare results with or without LEZ.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Lez

        public Lez(smartgov.urban.geo.utils.LatLon[] perimeter,
           LezCriteria lezCriteria)
        Lez constructor.
        Parameters:
        perimeter - polygon that describes the perimeter of the LEZ. If the polygon is not closed, it will be completed automatically.
        lezCriteria - criteria associated to this lez, that determines which vehicles are allowed or not

    • Method Detail

      • getPerimeter

        public smartgov.urban.geo.utils.LatLon[] getPerimeter()

      • getLezCriteria

        public LezCriteria getLezCriteria()
        Return the LEZ criteria associated to this LEZ, that determines which vehicles are allowed or not.
        Returns:
        lez criteria

      • costs

        public smartgov.core.environment.graph.astar.Costs costs(DeliveryVehicle deliveryVehicle)
        Returns the cost function associated to this vehicle, depending on its permission to enter the LEZ or not.
        • If the vehicle is allowed, a normal DistanceCosts is returned, as if the lez did not exist for this vehicle.
        • Else, LezCosts are used.
        Parameters:
        deliveryVehicle - vehicle
        Returns:
        cost function associated to the specified vehicle in the current urban area

      • contains

        public boolean contains(smartgov.urban.osm.environment.graph.OsmNode node)
        Determines if the specified osm node is contained in the lez, thanks to a JTS Point-In-Polygon algorithm.
        Parameters:
        node - osm node
        Returns:
        true if and only if the node is strictly contained in this LEZ

      • none

        public static Lez none()
        Returns a special LEZ instance with no perimeter and all vehicles allowed, that can be smartly used by scenarios with a lez parameter to compare results with or without LEZ.
        Returns:
        a lez with absolutely no restriction
